description.0: A sharp spear. Only its tip remains freshly bloodstained.

0.0: When the wielder is healed, restore <cryo>8</cryo> Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

1.0: When the wielder is healed, restore <cryo>10</cryo> Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

2.0: When the wielder is healed, restore <cryo>12</cryo> Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

3.0: When the wielder is healed, restore <cryo>14</cryo> Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

4.0: When the wielder is healed, restore <cryo>16</cryo> Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s, and can occur even when the character is not on the field.
